distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for pcre fixes the following issues:

Update pcre to version 8.45:

- CVE-2020-14155: Fixed integer overflow via a large number after a '(?C' substring (bsc#1172974).
- CVE-2019-20838: Fixed buffer over-read in JIT compiler (bsc#1172973)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: libpcre in PCRE before 8.43 allows a subject buffer over-read in JIT when UTF is disabled, and \X or \R has more than one fixed quantifier, a related issue to CVE-2019-20454.
notes.title: CVE description
